verses.verse: Stand <WG4739> fast therefore <WG3767> in the liberty <WG1657> with which <WG3739> Christ <WG5547> has made <WG1659> us free, <WG1659> and be not entangled <WG1758> again <WG3825> with the yoke <WG2218> of bondage. <WG1397>
Behold, <WG2396> I Paul <WG3972> say <WG3004> to you, that if <WG1437> you be circumcised, <WG4059> Christ <WG5547> shall profit <WG5623> you nothing. <WG3762>
For I testify <WG3143> again <WG3825> to every <WG3956> man <WG444> that is circumcised, <WG4059> that he is a debtor <WG3781> to do <WG4160> the whole <WG3650> law. <WG3551>
Christ <WG5547> is become <WG2673> of no <WG2673> effect <WG2673> to you, whoever <WG3748> of you are justified <WG1344> by the law; <WG3551> you are fallen <WG1601> from grace. <WG5485>
For we through the Spirit <WG4151> wait <WG553> for the hope <WG1680> of righteousness <WG1343> by faith. <WG4102>

For in Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> neither <WG3777> circumcision <WG4061> avails <WG2480> any <WG5100> thing, nor <WG3777> uncircumcision; <WG203> but faith <WG4102> which works <WG1754> by love. <WG26>
You did run <WG5143> well; <WG2573> who <WG5101> did hinder <WG348> you that you should not obey <WG3982> the truth? <WG225>
This <WG3588> persuasion <WG3988> comes not of him that calls <WG2564> you.
A little <WG3398> leaven <WG2219> leavens <WG2220> the whole <WG3650> lump. <WG5445>

I have confidence <WG3982> in you through <WG1722> the Lord, <WG2962> that you will be none <WG3762> otherwise <WG243> minded: <WG5426> but he that troubles <WG5015> you shall bear <WG941> his judgment, <WG2917> whoever <WG3748> <WG302> he be.

And I, brothers, <WG80> if <WG1487> I yet <WG2089> preach <WG2784> circumcision, <WG4061> why <WG5101> do I yet <WG2089> suffer <WG1377> persecution? <WG1377> then <WG686> is the offense <WG4625> of the cross <WG4716> ceased. <WG2673>
I would <WG3785> they were even <WG2532> cut <WG609> off <WG609> which trouble <WG387> you.

For, brothers, <WG80> you have been called <WG2564> to liberty; <WG1657> only <WG3440> use not liberty <WG1657> for an occasion <WG874> to the flesh, <WG4561> but by love <WG26> serve <WG1398> one <WG240> another. <WG240>
For all <WG3956> the law <WG3551> is fulfilled <WG4137> in one <WG1520> word, <WG4487> even in this; <WG3588> You shall love <WG25> your neighbor <WG4139> as yourself. <WG1438>
But if <WG1487> you bite <WG1143> and devour <WG2719> one <WG240> another, <WG240> take heed <WG991> that you be not consumed <WG355> one <WG240> of another. <WG240>
This I say <WG3004> then, <WG1161> Walk <WG4043> in the Spirit, <WG4151> and you shall not fulfill <WG5055> the lust <WG1939> of the flesh. <WG4561>

For the flesh <WG4561> lusts <WG1937> against <WG2596> the Spirit, <WG4151> and the Spirit <WG4151> against <WG2596> the flesh: <WG4561> and these <WG5023> are contrary <WG480> the one <WG240> to the other: <WG240> so <WG2443> that you cannot <WG3361> do <WG4160> the things that you would. <WG2309>
But if <WG1487> you be led <WG71> of the Spirit, <WG4151> you are not under <WG5259> the law. <WG3551>
Now <WG1161> the works <WG2041> of the flesh <WG4561> are manifest, <WG5318> which <WG3748> are these; Adultery, <WG3430> fornication, <WG4202> uncleanness, <WG167> lasciviousness, <WG766>
Idolatry, <WG1495> witchcraft, <WG5331> hatred, <WG2189> variance, <WG2054> jealousies, <WG2205> wrath, <WG2372> strife, <WG2052> seditions, <WG1370> heresies, <WG139>

Contentions, <WG5355> murders, <WG5408> drunkenness, <WG3178> revelings, <WG2970> and such <WG5125> like: <WG3664> of the which <WG3739> I tell <WG4302> you before, <WG4302> as I have also <WG2532> told <WG4277> you in time past, <WG4302> that they which do <WG4238> such <WG5108> things shall not inherit <WG2816> the kingdom <WG932> of God. <WG2316>
But the fruit <WG2590> of the Spirit <WG4151> is love, <WG26> joy, <WG5479> peace, <WG1515> long-suffering, <WG3115> gentleness, <WG5544> goodness, <WG19> faith, <WG4102>
Meekness, <WG4236> temperance: <WG1466> against <WG2596> such <WG5108> there is no <WG3756> law. <WG3551>
And they that are Christ's <WG5547> have crucified <WG4717> the flesh <WG4561> with the affections <WG3804> and lusts. <WG1939>
If <WG1487> we live <WG2198> in the Spirit, <WG4151> let us also <WG2532> walk <WG4748> in the Spirit. <WG4151>
Let us not be desirous <WG2755> of vain <WG2755> glory, <WG2755> provoking <WG4292> one <WG240> another, <WG240> envying <WG5354> one <WG240> another. <WG240>
